name: Percentages as rates per 100 using fractions.

skills.name: Calcuate percentage of an amount where the percent is an integer (US)
Find the whole amount when given a percentage (US)

explanations.A: The order of the words is important here. 65% of 780 tells us that we are going to multiply 65% x 780 in that order. With that in mind, what number should replace the star?
explanations.B: I think you may be confused by the idea of percent. Percents are out of 100, so to work with 65%, we will put 65 over 100. What number should replace the star so we can complete the calculation?
